commandCards.name: Whipcord Launcher
commandCards.text:
Boba Fett can perform moves while engaged with a unit that has 1 or more immobilized tokens. During Boba Fett's activation he gains:
    Choose an enemy trooper unit at range 1 and in line of sight. It gains 2 immobilized tokens and 2 suppression tokens.

commandCards.name: Z-6 Jetpack Launcher
commandCards.text: During Boba Fett's activation he gains the following weapon:

commandCards.name: ZX Flame Projector
commandCards.text: During Boba Fett's activation he gains the following weapon:

commandCards.name: Brains and Brawn
commandCards.text:
When Leia Organa is performing a ranged attack, if Chewbacca is not engaged and has line of sight to and is range 1-3 of the defender, add one
    of his ranged weapons to the attack pool.

commandCards.name: Common Cause
commandCards.text:
After Chewbacca activates, if Luke Skywalker has a faceup order token, he may activate.
    After Luke Skywalker activates, if Chewbacca has a faceup order token, he may activate.

commandCards.name: Notorious Scoundrels
commandCards.text: Choose one of Han Solo's command cards in your discard pile. Return that card to your hand.

commandCards.name: Implacable
commandCards.text: At the end of Darth Vader’s first activation, he may suffer 1 wound to shuffle his order token into the order pool. During Darth Vader's second activation, he performs 1 fewer action.

commandCards.name: Master of Evil
commandCards.text: When Darth Vader is issued an order, he gains 1 dodge token. When Darth Vader activates, each enemy trooper at range 1-2 of him gains 3 suppression tokens.

commandCards.name: New Ways To Motivate Them
commandCards.text: When a friendly non-Darth Vader trooper unit with a faceup order token activates, it may suffer 1 wound to perform 1 free action.

commandCards.name: And Now... You Will Die
commandCards.text: During Emperor Palpatine's activation, he may suffer 1 wound and gain 1 suppression token to perform an attack. He may do this any number of times. After Emperor Palpatine performs an attack, the defender gains 1 immobilized token.

commandCards.name: Give in to Your Anger
commandCards.text: Before an opponent would activate their first unit, you may choose an enemy trooper unit. If you do, your opponent must activate that unit instread. Assign it an order token from its order pool unless it has a faceup order token. At the end of that units's activation, if it did not perform an attack, it gains 4 suppression tokens.

commandCards.name: Evasive Maneuvers
commandCards.text: When a friendly vehicle unit is issued an order it gains 1 dodge token. Friendly vehicle units can spend dodge tokens to cancel critical hit results.

commandCards.name: Imperial Discipline
commandCards.text: When a friendly unit is issued an order it may recover.

commandCards.name: Maximum Firepower
commandCards.text: At the end of General Veers’ activation, he may perform an attacking using the following weapon.

commandCards.name: Change of Plans
commandCards.text: When this card is revealed, you may discard it to return an opponent's command card to their hand. If you do, return to the Select Command Card step. That opponent cannot select the command card that was returned to their hand.

commandCards.name: Reckless Diversion
commandCards.text: When an enemy unit performs an attack, it must attack a trooper unit that has a faceup order token, if available.

commandCards.name: Sorry About The Mess
commandCards.text: While building a command hand, treat this card as though it has 1 pip. When Han Solo is issued an order, he gains 1 aim token and 1 dodge token.

commandCards.name: Coordinated Bombardment
commandCards.text: At the end of Leia Organa's activation, you may perform up to 3 attacks against different enemy units using the following weapon.

commandCards.name: No Time for Sorrows
commandCards.text: When a friendly Trooper unit is issued an order, it may perform a speed-1 move.

commandCards.name: Somebody Has to Save Our Skins
commandCards.text: After Leia Organa's activation, you may choose a friendly unit at range 1-2 with a faceup order token and activate it.

commandCards.name: My Ally is the Force
commandCards.text: When a friendly trooper unit is issued an order, it gains 1 dodge token.

commandCards.name: Return of the Jedi
commandCards.text: When Luke Skywalker is issued an order, he gains 1 dodge token. When Luke Skywalker activates, each friendly trooper at range 1-3 of him may remove 1 suppression token.

commandCards.name: Son of Skywalker
commandCards.text: After Luke Skywalker performs his first attack he may perform 1 additional attack.

commandCards.name: Standing Orders
commandCards.text: At the end of the Command Phase, return this card to your hand.

upgrades.name: Commanding Presence
upgrades.text: When issuing orders, you can issue orders at range 4.

upgrades.name: Esteemed Leader
upgrades.text: While you are defending, each friendly corps trooper unit at range 1 gains Guardian 1.

upgrades.name: Improvised Orders
upgrades.text:
After an order token is drawn from a friendly order pool, draw a second order token from that pool.
    Choose 1 to use and shuffle the other back into the order pool. If you do, during the End Phase, ready this card.

upgrades.name: Comms Jammer
upgrades.text: Enemy units at range 1 cannot be issued orders, unless they are issuing an order to themselves.

upgrades.name: HQ Uplink
upgrades.text: During the Issue Orders step of the Command Phase, issue an order to yourself.

upgrades.name: Long-Range Comlink
upgrades.text: During the command phase, you may be issued orders as though you are in range of the nominated commander.

upgrades.name: Duck and Cover
upgrades.text: When defending from a Ranged Attack, during the Apply Cover and Dodge tokens step, you may assign yourself 1 Suppression token.

upgrades.name: Hunter
upgrades.text: While attacking a wounded trooper unit, during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may gain 1 aim token.

upgrades.name: Tenacity
upgrades.text: While performing a melee attack, if you are wounded or if one or more of your minis have been defeated, add 1 red attack die to your attack pool.

upgrades.name: Anger
upgrades.text: After you suffer 1 or more wounds, gain 1 aim token.

upgrades.name: Battle Meditation
upgrades.text: When you issue orders, one of those orders can be issued to any friendly unit on the battlefield.

upgrades.name: Force Choke
upgrades.text:
Choose an enemy trooper mini at range 1 that is not a commander.
    It suffers 1 wound.

upgrades.name: Force Push
upgrades.text:
Action: Choose an enemy trooper unit at range 1.
    Perform a speed-1 move with that unit, even if it is engaged.

upgrades.name: Force Reflexes
upgrades.text: Action: Gain 1 dodge token.

upgrades.name: Jedi Mind Trick
upgrades.text:
Action: Choose an enemy trooper at range 1-2.
    It gains 2 suppression tokens.

upgrades.name: Saber Throw
upgrades.text:
Action: Choose 1 of your melee weapons.
    Perform a ranged attack with that weapon against an enemy at range 1-2, using half of that weapon's dice, rounded up.
    This is treated as an attack action.

upgrades.name: Emergency Stims
upgrades.text:
During an attack, when you would suffer wounds, prevent up to 2 wounds and place an equal number of wound tokens on this card instead.
    If you do, at the end of your next activation, discard each token on this card and suffer wounds equal to the number of tokens discarded.

upgrades.name: Environmental Gear
upgrades.text: You gain Unhindered.

upgrades.name: Grappling Hooks
upgrades.text: You gain Expert Climber.

upgrades.name: Recon Intel
upgrades.text: You gain Scout 1.

upgrades.name: Targeting Scopes
upgrades.text: You gain Precise 1.

upgrades.name: Barrage Generator
upgrades.text: While performing a ranged attack with a weapon that has FIXED, add 2 white attack dice and apply SUPPRESSIVE to your attack pool.

upgrades.name: Overcharged Generator
upgrades.text: While performing a ranged attack with a weapon that has FIXED, add 1 black attack dice and apply IMPACT 1 to your attack pool.

upgrades.name: General Weiss
upgrades.text: Exhaust Action: Until the end of your activation, you gain Arsenal 2.

upgrades.name: Wedge Antilles
upgrades.text: Exhaust Action: Until the end of your activation, you gain Full Pivot.
